ygData.subject: Re: SPells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hail and well met. I am currently a lvl 15 cleric an the Rathe server. My recommendations for a weapon would be to try to find a mob that carries a staff.
ygData.messageBody:
> From: EQplayer@...
> Date: Thu, 3 Jun 1999 19:53:03 EDT
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Reply-to: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] SPells

> From: EQplayer@...
>
> I am level 5 and have a rusty flail for a wepon i have cure disease furor and
> lesser healing what other spells should i buy? is the weapon i have ok?
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> With more than 18 million e-mails exchanged daily...
> http://www.onelist.com
> ...ONElist is THE place where the world talks!
>
>
Hail and well met.
I am currently a lvl 15 cleric an the Rathe server. My
recommendations for a weapon would be to try to find a mob that
carries a staff. Great worn staff is an excellent 2h blunt weapon,
but do not neglect your 1h blunt skill as you will be in dire need of
it at higher lvls. I usually switch between my 1h and 2h to keep both
at an equal lvl.
As far as spells goes I recommend getting as many of them as
possible. With the possible exception of Cure Blindness which I have
yet to find a use for.
Chuck G - Searching for the light
